title: Get Property Features Response
description: Response payload for get_property_features task. Returns feature values for requested properties.

results.description: Feature values for each requested property

items.title: Property Feature Result
items.description: Feature values for a single property from a governance agent.

oneOf.title: Property ID
oneOf.description: Identifier for a publisher property. Must be lowercase alphanumeric with underscores only.

property.description: The property these features apply to

features.description: Map of feature_id to feature value

additionalProperties.title: Property Feature Value
additionalProperties.description: A single feature value for a property. Structure varies by feature type (binary, quantitative, categorical).

value.description: The feature value. Type depends on feature definition: boolean for binary, number for quantitative, string for categorical.

unit.description: Unit of measurement for quantitative values (e.g., 'gCO2e/1000_impressions', 'percentage')

measured_at.description: When this specific value was measured

expires_at.description: When this certification/value expires (for time-limited certifications)

methodology_version.description: Version of the methodology used to calculate this value

details.description: Additional vendor-specific details about this measurement

ext.title: Extension Object
ext.description: Extension object for platform-specific, vendor-namespaced parameters. Extensions are always optional and must be namespaced under a vendor/platform key (e.g., ext.gam, ext.roku). Used for custom capabilities, partner-specific configuration, and features being proposed for standardization.

coverage_status.description: Whether this property is covered by this governance agent: covered (has data), not_covered (not measured), pending (measurement in progress)

last_evaluated.description: When features were last evaluated for this property

ext.title: Extension Object
ext.description: Extension object for platform-specific, vendor-namespaced parameters. Extensions are always optional and must be namespaced under a vendor/platform key (e.g., ext.gam, ext.roku). errors.description: Errors for properties that could not be processed

items.title: Error
items.description: Standard error structure for task-specific errors and warnings

field.description: Field path associated with the error (e.g., 'packages[0].targeting')

retry_after.description: Seconds to wait before retrying the operation
